cells.m_text_in:
@echo off
rem build script for the project
rem [button: Debug]
set LANG=zh_CN.utf8
jc --readable_c_code zmain.jc --run

# TODO LIST
module system
	support node-like private modules
	the fs could be messy
	ignore extension
	search on GetClass, only use initial enum for AC
	we may not need /
		separate module management and module searching
	==
	flat files for code / js
	single-level child-dir for nested nodes
		which can have private nodes
		znodes
		node uses child-dir
			easy renaming?
basic edit ops
	param window, param ui
running the nodes
rendering ports: << >> to indicate input / output
	the font trick
multiple output in code nodes: @out regions
what about identifier outs? *indented* lines
merging:
	https://github.com/dominictarr/xdiff

@echo off
rem build script for 'c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc'
rem [button: Release]
cd /d c:/tp/qpad
jc -brelease -awin64 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
jc -brelease -awin32 c:/tp/qpad/qpad.jc
cd bin\win32_release
del qpad3beta_32.7z
7z a qpad3beta_32.7z qpad.exe
cd /d c:\tp\qpad
cd bin\win64_release
del qpad3beta_64.7z
7z a qpad3beta_64.7z qpad.exe
del c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad_old.exe
ren c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe qpad_old.exe
copy qpad.exe c:\software\cmder\bin\qpad.exe
cells.m_text_out:

cells.m_text_in:
#!/bin/sh
#[button: Translate]
cd /c/tp/qpad/res
grep -ERoh text:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * > ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh UI\._\\\(\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\)\\\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh UI\.Format\\\(\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\), * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh tooltip:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
grep -ERoh ,name:\(\([\"][^\"]+[\"]\)\|\([\'][^\']+[\']\)\) * >> ../build/translation.txt
